author: andreas
content:
Hehe, thanks all. I already have a 64 bit driver, whether it will install or not, that's to be seen. If I manage to get the NVIDIA card to work under 64 bit, I just have to install Photoshop et al., and my games for those log train sessions, and then I'm done. If I can't get it to run on 64 bit, I'll shell out another 80â‚¬ for Windows 7 32 bit, reinstall once more, call it an experience, and that's supposed to work in any case. We'll see.

Old cars? I don't know, sounds more like new cars to me. Whenever I read a Steinbeck and someone fixes a Model T, I have to smile. Those were the days when cars could be fixed by lay people without computers to aid them ðŸ™‚
